subject: Your login confirmation code
plainText: You attempted to login to your %s Supernode account. Here's your one-time password: %s. If this wasn't you, we highly suggest that you change your password as soon as possible.
title: %s Supernode - Login Attempt
body2: You attempted to login to your %s Supernode account.
body5: we highly suggest that you change your password as soon as possible.
